title: 现在mcbbs都没人了。。。
author: LHK1210
txt_content: 自闭了，都被网易拉走了？

replies.author: 极影Sama
replies.txt_content: 怎么会 我看人挺多的啊 倒是网易快凉了

replies.author: 某LJ的小号
replies.txt_content: 是网易快凉了吧

replies.author: 快乐小方
replies.txt_content:
我怎么觉得mcbbs比网易论坛的人多呢
（这两天网站为了防小学生把论坛访问权都关了）

replies.author: 辻午
replies.txt_content: sssssssssssssssss

replies.author: 世界の尽头
replies.txt_content: 没人了，我康很多啊awa

replies.author: 女神M哥
replies.txt_content: 个人感觉网易快凉了

replies.author: 白焰BaiYan
replies.txt_content: MCBBS没人嘛，你去看看每日发帖数怎么会没人呢

replies.author: Hz_bingc
replies.txt_content: 只是不活跃吧?mcbbs好东西/干货挺多的

replies.author: Lagerfeld_
replies.txt_content: 。。没人的是网易吧。。做的那么烂

replies.author: Skyer
replies.txt_content:
这是季节现象
这个时候是淡季中的旺季

replies.author: ljh221
replies.txt_content: 你别说,wy论坛还没这里活跃

replies.author: Flowers_花花
replies.txt_content: 你不是人????  这不是一堆人才么

replies.author: mingzihh
replies.txt_content: 不可能的

replies.author: 空空图
replies.txt_content: 不是啊  不是挺多人的嘛

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 跟几年前比确实人少了，但是人还是很多，你看每天的发帖

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content: 刚刚我403了是不是访问，问题。

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content: 你觉得没人，大概是这两天审核的比较严

replies.author: WQ【义战】
replies.txt_content: 没有人吗?看看网易外挂满天飞
挺多的你咋不看其他地方的回复

replies.author: 盒聚变打击
replies.txt_content: 耦合耦合耦合耦合耦合耦合

replies.author: wangmcptr
replies.txt_content: 怎么算有人

replies.author: _Hao_ge_
replies.txt_content: 网易做的是真的不行，不会有这么多人去那边的

replies.author: shenren3-f
